ARABIC: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'My Lord expands the provision of anyone He wills or restricts it. But the majority of mankind do not know it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "Verily my Lord increases or restricts the provision of whosoever He will;" but most men do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), say to them: “My Lord grants provision abundantly to whomsoever He pleases and straitens it for whomsoever He pleases. But most people do not know this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "My Lord increases and determines the sustenance of whomever He wants, but most people do not know."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim “Indeed my Lord eases the sustenance for whomever He wills and restricts it for whomever He wills, but most people do not know.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Verily, my Lord expands the provision to whom He wills and restricts, but most men know not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Surely my Lord amplifies the means of subsistence for whom He pleases and straitens (for whom He pleases), but most men do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'My Lord outspreads and straitens His provision to whomsoever He will, but most men do not know it.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (O Muhammad): Lo! my Lord enlargeth the provision for whom He will and narroweth it (for whom He will). But most of mankind know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say to them, "My Lord increases the provision for whoever He pleases and decreases it for whoever He pleases; but most people do not know it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: verily my Lord expandeth the provision for whomsoever He will and stinteth it; but most of mankind know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Indeed my Lord expands the provision for whomever He wishes and He tightens it, but most people do not know.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Verily my Lord enlarges and restricts the Provision to whom He pleases, but most men understand not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Verily, my Lord enlarges and restricts the provision to whom He pleases, but most men know not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'My Lord outspreads and withholds His provision to whomsoever He will. But most people do not know'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “My Lord spreads out His bounty to whomever He wills, or restricts it; but most people do not know.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it], but most of the people do not know."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:36] Say: ‘Truly my Lord extends provision, He makes it abundant, for whomever He will, as a test, and restricts [it], for whomever He will, to try [them], but most people, such as the disbelievers of Mecca, do not know’, this [truth].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad: (Lo! my Lord enlargeth the provision for whom He will) as a lure to perdition (and narroweth it (for whom He will) out of care for him. (But most of mankind) the people of Mecca (know not) this nor believe it.
